text: Guerrino Zanotti (born 15 August 1964) is a Sammarinese politician who served as a Captain Regent with Gianfranco Terenzi, from October 2014 to April 2015. He is also a member of the Grand and General Council. Zanotti has been a member of the Party of Socialists and Democrats since it was formed in 2005. He is married and has two sons.San Marino. Eletti i nuovi Capitani Reggenti: Gian Franco Terenzi e Guerrino Zanotti (Libertas.sm) In 2016, Zanotti was re- elected to the Grand and General Council, and he became the Secretary of State for Internal Affairs. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Captains Regent of San Marino Category:Members of the Grand and General Council Category:Living people Category:Party of Socialists and Democrats politicians
title: Guerrino Zanotti
